articles.description: Opener Brandon King hits an unbeaten 82 as West Indies beat England by 10 runs in the second T20 in Grenada.
articles.title: King leads West Indies to T20 victory over England

articles.description: MKE Ankaragucu president Faruk Koca receives a permanent ban for punching referee Halil Umut Meler, says the Turkish Football Federation.
articles.title: Koca given permanent ban for referee punch

articles.description: Already-qualified Liverpool end their Europa League group campaign with a loss away in Belgium against Union Saint-Gilloise.
articles.title: Youthful Liverpool lose in Europa League group tie

articles.description: Former England head coach Eddie Jones says he does not "feel any guilt" about becoming Japan boss, six weeks after resigning from the Australia job.
articles.title: Jones feels no 'guilt' over Japan appointment

articles.description: Paris St-Germain are keen on Man Utd's Casemiro, Mohamed Salah set for Liverpool stay in January, Villarreal want Arsenal's Cedric, plus more.
articles.title: PSG eye Casemiro move - Friday's gossip

articles.description: Rebecca Welch will become the first female referee to take charge of a men's Premier League match on 23 December.
articles.title: Welch to become Premier League's first female referee

articles.description: Rennes are denied a vital stoppage-time equaliser against Villarreal in the Europa League in bizarre circumstances.
articles.title: Rennes denied late equaliser in bizarre fashion

articles.description: Golden State Warriors forward Draymond Green is handed rare open-ended ban by the NBA following his third ejection of the season.
articles.title: Draymond Green: NBA star suspended indefinitely after Jusuf Nurkic clash

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at who is in the Europe's last-16 draws - and how it all works.
articles.title: All you need to know about Europe's last-16 draws

articles.description: Six of Lionel Messi's shirts worn during the 2022 World Cup sell for a combined $7.8m (£6.1m) at a Sotheby's auction in New York.
articles.title: Six of Messi's 2022 World Cup shirts sell for £6.1m
